metadata.name: Xia One #1
metadata.description:
Xia One is a free-to-play NFT-powered RPG game about exploration, karma, and close-quarter combat. Play as one of the 7,777 Xia (vigilante) with unique talents, classes, and skills, to save or bend the world in any way you see fit.

All Xia One NFT holders will be eligible to claim weapon NFT airdrops in October, 2022. The game to be released on March 2023 will be openly accessible for all, only Xia One NFT holders can farm ERC-20 token $KARMA from game.
